title: Corina Cotorobai
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Corina Cotorobai**

Typographer. Graduate of Type and Media at [KABK](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Royal%20Academy%20of%20Art) and [Werkplaats Typografie](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Werkplaats%20Typografie). Managing partner at [OurType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165158/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OurType).

author: Co
